New Records: Seth Lugo's 2.94 ERA and 1.09 WHIP are notable performances this season
Key Match Events: Seth Lugo's shutout performance against the Yankees on Tuesday boosted his record to 16-8 for the season
Pre-Game Insights: The Royals' assistant director of PR, Ian Kraft, posted a document on Twitter sharing the case for Lugo and Ragans to be considered for the AL Cy Young this season
Post-Match Reflections: Seth Lugo's performance on Tuesday likely will surpass Seattle's Logan Gilbert on the fWAR list
Miscellaneous Highlights: Lugo has thrown 46.9 more innings this season than last season, and seems destined to easily cross the 200 IP threshold by the conclusion of the 2024 season
Others: The article discusses the Cy Young race and how Lugo and Ragans are contenders, but notes that Detroit's Tarik Skubal is the favorite for the award
